bConsumeInput: Prevents actors with lower priority from handling this input
bExecuteWhenPaused: Should the binding execute even when the game is paused
bOverrideParentBinding: Should any bindings to this event in parent classes be removed
bControl: Does this binding require the control key on PC or the command key on Mac to be held
bAlt: Does this binding require the alt key to be held
bShift: Does this binding require the shift key to be held
bCommand: Does this binding require the windows key on PC or the control key on Mac to be held
